column1: Error happened while deleting role and permissions. Check exception log for details.
column2: 当删除角色和权限时发生错误，展开异常日志查看详细原因。

column1: Error happened while getting a list of allowed resources. Check exception log for details.
column2: 当查询允许资源列表时发生错误。检查异常日志查询详细原因。

column1: Error happened while granting permissions. Check exception log for details.
column2: 当授权时发生错误。检查异常日志查询详细原因。

column1: The role associated with the specified user cannot be found.
column2: 未发现与指定用户关联的角色。
